segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, creating a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit disgusting to see the water just pouring out like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems completely oblivious to the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long the sink has been overflowing and if it will cause any damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are so focused on the cookies that they don't notice the water either.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit funny how everyone is so absorbed in their own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices the overflow soon before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene looks so chaotic, but everyone seems calm and unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit sad seeing the mess and no one caring about it.
segments.speaker: PAR
